short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An that helps educators and PR reviewers submit a batch of PR reviews together on GitHub

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps the Pull Request reviewers/github classroom teachers to easily submit all the PR reviews at once.
All you need to do is to be on the "files" page on all the PRs, and then open the extension. Then with the click of one button (or many, based on your preference), all the reviews will be submitted at once üôåüèΩ
